subject: RE: [junit] Including test cases with production code
msgSnippet: ... I agree in principle, although other test tool vendors might take issue with the wording :-) ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ Mike Silverstein SilverMark, Inc.
messageBody:
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Vladimir Bossicard [mailto:vladimir@...]
> Sent: Friday, July 06, 2001 11:07 AM
> To: junit@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: Re: [junit] Including test cases with production code
>
> You can be proud of your test code but I think that it's better said in
> the release note: "JUnit -the leading testing framework for Java
> application- has executed xxx tests to ensure that your application's
> quality meets the highest standards... blah blah blah" :-)

I agree in principle, although other test tool vendors might take issue with
the wording :-)
